definition: to sift chaff/(fig.) to shake all over
to screen or filter out/to winnow (agriculture)

sentences.english: The secondary screens receive the coal from the crushers and remove the fines.
sentences.chinese: 经压碎后的煤通过第二道筛，筛出细粉。

sentences.english: And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.
sentences.chinese: 洗鲁雅的儿子是亚比筛，约押，亚撒黑，共三人。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the significance of ethmoidal artery in operation of ethmoidal sinus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨筛动脉在筛窦手术中的意义。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the significance of ethmoidal artery in operation of ethmoidal sinus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨筛动脉在筛窦手术中的意义。

sentences.english: His daily work is to riddle coal cinders to get out the larger pieces.
sentences.chinese: 他每天的工作是用粗筛筛煤渣，将大块的煤渣挑出来。

sentences.english: His daily work is to riddle coal cinders to get out the larger pieces.
sentences.chinese: 他每天的工作是用粗筛筛煤渣，将大块的煤渣挑出来。

sentences.english: Screening is employed for removal of suspended solids of various sizes .
sentences.chinese: 格筛用来去除大小不同的悬浮固体。

sentences.english: The organic matter content of oversized compost in screen was higher than that of undersized compost in the maturity compost.
sentences.chinese: 腐熟垃圾堆肥筛分后的筛上物有机物含量高于筛下物。

sentences.english: He is sitting in the courtyard, sifting rice with a bamboo sieve.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在院子里，正在用箩筛筛米。

sentences.english: Sift out the wheat from the chaff.
Qualified fine materials are emitted by inner-sifter, crude materials continue to be broken.
sentences.chinese: 合格细料经内置筛筛分排出，粗料继续被破碎。

sentences.english: Add the dry ingredients into the butter mixture to form a batter.
sentences.chinese: 把筛好的粉类加入牛油糊中拌匀成面糊。

sentences.english: Abishai son of Zeruiah struck down eighteen thousand Edomites in the Valley of Salt.
sentences.chinese: 洗鲁雅的儿子亚比筛在盐谷击杀了以东一万八千人。

sentences.english: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand.
sentences.chinese: 洗鲁雅的儿子亚比筛在盐谷击杀了以东一万八千人。

sentences.english: Then you sifted it so all the sand would fall through.
sentences.chinese: 然后你把它筛一下，于是全部沙子会穿过筛孔掉下去。

sentences.english: Shaking screen on crank-connecting rod for reciprocating motion to the sieve case.
sentences.chinese: 摇动筛依靠曲柄连杆机构使筛箱作往复运动。

definition: to screen or filter out/to winnow (agriculture)
